### Description

*Potential breaking change:*
- [Banner] - Banner sizing changed, in particular the height. Might cause layout / styling changes for consumers

*Fixes:*
- [Banner] - Banner Leading Text font size changed & small adjustments to padding to confirm with design specs
- [Banner] - Added `--mdc-banner-border-width` css custom property for more flexibility
